articles.author: Matina Stevis-Gridneff, Monika Pronczuk
articles.title: Ioannis Lagos, Greek Neo-Nazi Lawmaker, Stripped of Immunity by European Parliament - The New York Times
articles.description: Ioannis Lagos, sentenced to 13 years in prison by a Greek court for his part in running the fascist Golden Dawn party, had been immune from extradition as an elected member of the European Union’s legislature.
articles.content: The decision by the European Parliament was welcomed by left-wing Greek politicians. The neo-Nazi Lagos no longer has immunity at the European Parliament, Nasos Iliopoulos, the spokesman for Syriza, … [+1477 chars]

articles.title: US tourists set to be welcomed back into Europe soon - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: More than 15 million Americans a year visited Europe before the crisis.
articles.content:
American tourists could soon be visiting continental Europe again, more than a year after the European Union restricted travel to the 27-nation bloc to a bare minimum to contain the coronavirus.
